name: Data Analyst
description:
Job Responsibilities

  • Proficient in querying relational databases
  • Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues
  • Works closely with all business units to develop internal projects
  • Collaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models that feed business intelligence tools
  • Increasing data accessibility and fostering data-driven decision making across the organization
  • Assist in gathering requirements for data solutions and maintaining data mapping specifications
  • Understand, follow and drive design principles and best practices for the integration techniques
  • Monitor and troubleshoot production issues related to the integration jobs
  • Coordinate with analysts and developers to ensure jobs designed and developed meet minimum support standards and best practices before migration into the production environment
  • Works with client's requests on daily basis

Skills

  • SQL expertise in one or more relational databases
  • Process oriented with great documentation skills
  • Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills

Qualifications

  • Minimum 2 years working experience in SQL, Stored Procedures and Table Design
  • MS Excel advance level (pivots, formulas etc.), VBA as plus
  • Upper-intermediate english level
  • Customer focused person

Education, Experience, and Licensing Requirements

  • BS or MS degree in Computer Science or a related technical field
  • 2+ years of SQL experience
  • Experience maintaining data processing systems
